survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Recycling Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and engagement with workplace recycling initiatives, identifying areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your workplace's recycling programs and policies?
answer_options: Very aware - I know all the details
Somewhat aware - I know the basics
Not very aware - I've heard about it but don't know details
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale to measure awareness levels clearly without a neutral midpoint.
